backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining authorization mixins, storage integration, and many public types for articles, profiles, subscriptions, journals, and related data models.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented offline bundle features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of frontend source files and their responsibilities across components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining pre‑deployment checks and steps for promoting a reviewed frontend build to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining base layers, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/offline-bundle/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/css/styles.css: Standalone CSS file providing full offline site styling including layout, colors, typography, and components.
frontend/offline-bundle/fonts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file so the fonts directory remains in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/hero-illu: SVG illustration used in the offline site's hero section.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/journal-p: SVG placeholder image representing a journal cover for the offline site.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/logo.svg: An SVG logo containing stylized plant-like paths and circles with themed colors.
frontend/offline-bundle/index.html: Static landing page HTML for Agrigence with sections for navigation, hero content, about, and forms.
frontend/offline-bundle/js/app.js: Handles mobile menu toggling, smooth scrolling, form validation, and basic UI interactions for the offline bundle.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.md: README explaining how to open and use the offline static website and showing its folder structure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router setup defining all application routes and wrapping providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an alert message indicating insufficient permissions.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: A countdown component showing time remaining until the 25th of the month.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer layout with submission deadline timer, contact info, social links, and visitor counter.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with links, search, authentication menu, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, marquee banner, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Animated loading screen supporting determinate and indeterminate progress with fade-out and SVG book animation.
frontend/src/components/NoticeMarqueeBan: Displays a looping marquee banner of notices when enabled via configuration.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form for capturing and saving a user's profile with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Dialog for configuring Stripe by submitting secret key and allowed country codes with validation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: LocalStorage‑based visitor counter that increments on load and displays the count.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, banners, news, and other data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and adds base typography and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About & Contact page with mission info, founders, and a contact form with toast-based submission feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an About page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelContent.tsx: Implements the full admin dashboard with CRUD operations for news, blogs, journals, editorial members, terms, and banner notices.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Checks admin status and conditionally renders the admin panel, loading state, or access-denied screen.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Provides an authenticated article submission form with subscription checks and upload progress handling.
Displays detailed author guidelines, publication policies, and formatting requirements with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for a contact page.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard with profile info, articles, and subscription status, handling authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Fetches and displays editorial board members with images, roles, and contact details using cards.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a form for requesting password reset instructions, currently using a placeholder implementation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, latest news, blogs, magazines, reviews, and article previews.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Shows the current journal issue and an archive filtered by year, allowing users to download journal PDFs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login form with email/password fields, client-side validation, and placeholder authentication logic.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays news and blog posts with tab switching, loading states, and date formatting using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, creates a subscription if successful, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides a registration form with field validation and placeholder backend logic for account creation.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Lists subscription plans, checks Stripe configuration, and initiates checkout sessions for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: React page that fetches and displays Terms and Conditions with loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/optimizeImage.ts: Client-side image optimizer that resizes, compresses, and optionally falls back to the original file if optimization fails or isn’t smaller.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Simple utilities for setting document title and meta description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing architecture, features, and known issues of the Agrigence web app.
